thread.title: Spectre's Naomie Harris Defends Daniel Craig Saying He Prefers Suicide to Another Bond Film
thread.title_full: Spectre's Naomie Harris Defends Daniel Craig Saying He Prefers Suicide to Another Bond Film

author: TV Guide
title: Spectre's Naomie Harris Defends Daniel Craig Saying He Prefers Suicide to Another Bond Film
text: Spectre's Naomie Harris Defends Daniel Craig Saying He Prefers Suicide to Another Bond Film Naomie Harris said her James Bond co-star Daniel Cra... Comment Posted Oct. 13, 2015 at 2:10 PM Updated at 4:50 PM Posted Oct. 13, 2015 at 2:10 PM Updated at 4:50 PM Â» Social News Naomie Harris said her James Bond co-star Daniel Craig was just kidding when he said he'd rather "slash my wrists" than play 007 again. Harris, who plays Moneypenny in Spectre and Skyfal l , told BBC News that Craig's "sense of humor ... doesn't come across particularly well in print." "It's easy to take something that someone says in passing and blow it completely out of proportion," Harris explained. "I think that's what's happened here, so I don't really believe those comments at all." And though Craig said he has no current plans to do a fifth Bond movie, Harris said that he is "the ultimate Bond" and "it wouldn't be Bond without him." Other Links From TVGuide.com
